Title: Requires nebulizers on school grounds; appropriation
Summary: Requires nebulizers on school grounds; makes an appropriation therefor.
LawCode: Add ยง804-e, amd ยง919, Ed L; amd ยง2, Chap 672 of 2007
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to requiring nebulizers on school grounds; and to amend chapter 672 of the laws of 2007, amending the education law relating to the maintenance of on-site nebulizers, in relation to the effectiveness thereof; and making an appropriation therefor
